actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the medical expense deduction limitation to 5 percent of adjusted gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the limitation of the medical expense income tax deduction from 7.5 percent of adjusted gross income to five percent of adjusted gross income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the medical expense deduction limitation to 5 percent of adjusted gross income.
